data.title: Great Place!
data.text: I have eaten breakfast and lunch here a few times. The ham and cheese omelette is awesome as well as burgers and hotdogs. The staff is always pleasant and attentive. A great place to sit down and have an awesome meal at a good price.

data.title: Good food
data.text: This place was very busy. Our food took a little long to get which was expected. It was good I had the Philly cheese steak on hoagie. I would probably add extra cheese next time because I will definitely be Back. Thanks for the good food. I see why you're busy.

data.title: Nothing you can't make at home (Suffolk)
data.text: Hoping for a little homemade local deliciousness, but nearly everything comes out of a can, or at least it tastes that way.  My husband said the chili dogs are ok, but not much else.

data.title: Great Hot Dogs, (Suffolk location)
data.text: I stopped in Poppy's to get hot dogs to go. My husband and I have frequented this location in Suffolk since it's opening. They food has consistently been good. Excellent chili dogs, chili cheese fries, onion rings and boardwalk fries. Customer service has been equally good.
